ValidationRule.description: Restricting users not to change statuses manually from pending approval to approved or vice-versa
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
(( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Status), "Submitted" ) || ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Status), "Initial Review" ) || ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Status), "Investigator Review" )) && ISPICKVAL(Status, "Pending Approval")) ||
(( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Status), "Submitted" ) || ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Status), "Initial Review" ) || ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Status), "Investigator Review" ) || ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Status), "Pending Approval" )) && ISPICKVAL(Status, "Approved")) ||
(NOT (ISBLANK( ApprovedDate )) && ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Status), "Approved" ) && ISPICKVAL(Status, "Pending Approval"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Status cannot be changed. Use another Status.
